items.sentence: Tom and Mary are in the kitchen, preparing dinner.
Tom and Mary are studying together in the library.
Tom and Mary asked John to babysit their children.
Tom and Mary discussed their plans for the future.
Tom and Mary divided the money between themselves.
You don\'t have to do anything you don\'t want to.
Tom can\'t remember exactly where he put his keys.
Tom can\'t remember which ping-pong paddle is his.
Tom carried Mary\'s suitcase up to the guest room.
Tom has really made the most of his opportunities.
